faq.title: Common Questions
faq.question1_title: Does NotionLock see my private data?
faq.question1_answer: No. We never access or store the content of your Notion pages. We simply act as a gatekeeper, verifying the password before redirecting the user to your content.
faq.question2_title: Can I use this for paid content?
faq.question2_answer: Absolutely. Many creators use NotionLock to deliver exclusive content to paying subscribers or clients.
faq.question3_title: What happens if I stop paying?
faq.question3_answer: Your Pro links will revert to Free links (with ads and branding) but will remain accessible. You won't be locked out of your data.
faq.question4_answer: This feature is rolling out to Pro users. You'll be able to map secure.yourdomain.com to your protected page.
faq.question5_title: Is the Lifetime Deal really one-time?
faq.question5_answer: Yes! We hate subscriptions as much as you do. Pay once, use it forever.
faq.question6_answer: Yes, Pro users can manage multiple passwords for the same link, allowing for granular access control.
faq.question7_title: Do I need a paid Notion account?
faq.question7_answer: No, NotionLock works perfectly with the free version of Notion.
faq.question8_title: Can I remove the NotionLock branding?
faq.question8_answer: Yes, the White-label feature available in all Pro plans allows you to remove all NotionLock branding and present a clean, professional look.
faq.question9_answer: We use client-side AES encryption. The password verification happens securely, and your page content is never exposed to our servers without the correct key.

privacy_page.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_page.intro_p1: At NotionLock, we take data protection seriously. This policy outlines what we collect and why.
privacy_page.data_p1: We collect the minimum necessary data to operate the service.
privacy_page.data_li1: Account Info: Email address for account management.
privacy_page.data_li2: Page Data: We store the Notion URL you provide and the hashed password. We DO NOT store page content.
privacy_page.data_li3: Cookies: Essential cookies for login sessions and analytics.
privacy_page.security_p1: We use SSL/TLS encryption for all data in transit and bcrypt for password hashing.
privacy_page.sharing_p1: We do not sell your personal data. We share data only with essential service providers (e.g., payment processors, email services).
privacy_page.rights_p1: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data at any time via your dashboard.
privacy_page.changes_p1: We may update this policy. Significant changes will be notified via email.
privacy_page.contact_p1: For privacy concerns, reach out to support@notionlock.com.
